DOC.brief_summary: Uniportal video-assisted thoracoscopic surgery ( VATS ) lobectomy emerged promising excite approach minimally invasive thoracic surgery . Here , investigator undertake novel uniportal VATS technique involve subxiphoid route pulmonary lobectomy evaluate feasibility advantage .
